categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Saryta was a female Human Jedi Master stationed on Quesh around 3642 BBY, when she was killed.

Saryta appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a Champion boss on Quesh. She is not directly involved in any quests, but can be killed for loot and as part of the achievement. This article assumes 100% game completion, which means she was killed.
